text: Kwazini kananjalo okokuba ubomi balo mhlaba yintlekisa njee nesiphambukisi nobunewunewu nokuqhayiselana nokhuphiswano ekwandiseni ubutyebi nabantwana njengomzekelo wemvula ezityalo zayo zikhula zigcobise umhlwayeli, zisuke zome, ubone sele zijike zamthubi; zisuke zibe bubutyobo obuthe saa.
